EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email alert template invitation to the Survey: Pro Sales Call Center
EmailTemplate.name: [ Send using Workflow ] Pro Sales Call Center
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this survey: Pro Sales Call Center
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please complete this survey at:
{!IF(Contact.Id != null,IF(Case.Id != null,'https://timbasurveys.na5.visual.force.com/apex/Survey?id=a0O700000035hPFEAY&cId='+Contact.Id+'&case_id='+Case.Id+'&wf=yes','https://timbasurveys.na5.visual.force.com/apex/Survey?id=a0O700000035hPFEAY&cId='+Contact.Id+'&wf=yes'),'')}
